S02vjviddhu:3_0: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasmin samaye bhagavān vajreṣu viharati sma /
S02vjviddhu:3_1: sarvaśarīraṃ vajramayamadhiṣṭhāya vajrapāṇiśca buddhānubhāvena vajrasamādhiṃ samāpannaḥ /
S02vjviddhu:3_2: tato vajrapāṇiḥ [sarva]buddhānubhāvena sarvabuddhādhiṣṭhānaṃ [sarvabodhisattvādhiṣṭhā]nañca mahākrodhasambhūtaṃ vajrasāramabhāṣate sma /
S02vjviddhu:3_3_0: acchedyamabhedyaṃ satyaṃ dṛḍhaṃ sthiraṃ sarvatrāpratihataṃ sarvatrāparājitaṃ sarvasattvavidrāvaṇakaraṃ
S02vjviddhu:3_3_5: pauṣṭikaṃ sarvasattvānāñca stambhanakaraṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca mohanakaram imaṃ mantraṃ
S02vjviddhu:4_0_0: om namo ratnatrayāya / namaścaṇḍavajrapāṇaye / mahāyakṣasenāpataye / tadyathā - om
S02vjviddhu:4_0_1: truṭa truṭa troṭaya troṭaya sphuṭa sphuṭa sphoṭaya sphoṭaya ghurṇa ghurṇa ghurṇāpaya
S02vjviddhu:4_0_2: [Vvdh_162] ghurṇāpaya sarvasattvānāṃ vibodhaya vibodhaya sambodhaya sambodhaya bhrama
S02vjviddhu:4_0_3: bhrama saṃbhrāmaya saṃbhrāmaya sarvabhūtāni kuṭa kuṭa saṃkuṭaya saṃkuṭaya sarvaśatrūn
S02vjviddhu:4_0_4: ghaṭa ghaṭa saṃdhāṭaya saṃghāṭaya sarvavidyā vajra vajrasphoṭaya vajra vajra kaṭa
S02vjviddhu:4_0_5: vajra vajra maṭa vajra vajra matha vajra vajra aṭṭahāsanīlavajrasuvajrāya svāhā /
S02vjviddhu:4_1: om he fullu nirufullu nigṛhṇa kullu mili cullu kuru kullu vajravijayāya svāhā /
S02vjviddhu:4_2: om kilikīlāya svāhā / om kaṭa kaṭa maṭa maṭa raṭa raṭa moṭana pramoṭanāya svāhā /
S02vjviddhu:4_3: om cara nicara hara hara sara sara māraya vajravidāraṇāya svāhā /
S02vjviddhu:5_0: om chinda chinda bhinda bhinda mahākilikīlāya svāhā /
S02vjviddhu:5_1: om bandha bandha krodha krodha vajrakilikīlāya svāhā /
S02vjviddhu:5_6: om matisthiravajra śrutisthiravajra pratisthiravajra mahāvajra apratihatavajra amoghavajra aihivajra śīghraṃ vajrāya svāhā /
S02vjviddhu:5_7: om dhara dhara dhiri dhiri dhuru dhuru sarvavajrakulamāvartāya svāhā /
S02vjviddhu:6_0_0: om namaḥ samantavajrāṇām / sarvabalamāvartaya mahābale kaṭabale tatale acale maṇḍalamaye
S02vjviddhu:6_0_1: ativajra mahābale vegaraṇa ajite jvala jvala tiṭi tiṭi ti(piṃ)ṅgale daha daha tejovati
S02vjviddhu:6_0_2: tili tili bandha bandha mahābale vajrāṅkuśajvālāya svāhā /
S02vjviddhu:7_2_0: tadyathā - om hara hara vajra matha matha vajra dhuna dhuna vajra daha daha vajra
S02vjviddhu:7_2_1: paca paca vajra dhara dhara vajra dhāraya dhāraya vajra dāruṇa dāruṇa vajra chinda
S02vjviddhu:7_2_2: chinda vajra bhinda bhinda vajra hūṃ phaṭ /
S02vjviddhu:8_0: om namaścaṇḍavajrakrodhāya / om hulu hulu tiṣṭha tiṣṭha bandha bandha hana hana amṛte hūṃ phaṭ /
S02vjviddhu:9_10: śṛṇvantu ye (te) idaṃ sūtraṃ gambhīraṃ buddhagocaram //
S02vjviddhu:9_12: te ca sarve ca duṣṭātmā upasargā sudāruṇāḥ //
S02vjviddhu:9_18: ghaṭaṃ tu rajataṃ cāpi śucivastreṇa vāsitam /
S02vjviddhu:9_20: japedvidāraṇaṃ mantraṃ yaḥ snāyāt pārthivaḥ sadā /
S02vjviddhu:9_21: evaṃ yaḥ kurute nityaṃ tasya sampadyate śubham //
S02vjviddhu:10_0: idamavocad bhagavānāttamanāste ca bhikṣavaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti /
